clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in rheumatoid arthritis

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: PMI 001 is a novel orally bioavailable small molecule based plant derived multi component disease modifying agent currently being developed for rheumatoid arthritis Potential applications of this drug candidate beyond rheumatoid arthritis include a wide range of autoimmune disorders including psoriasis lupus inflammatory bowel disease IBD and multiple sclerosis MS
